name: The Code (Remastered)
description:
Chapter 1

Mysterious creatures have been reported in a dark valley, as Yael you must explore the area and see if you can find where they are coming from. Fight the creatures, Level up, use Tek Fragments to augment your combat abilities and see if you can piece together the mystery that has been left behind.

A blend of frantic 3rd person shooter action and tactical decision making, The Code is inspired by games such as Resident Evil, Silent Hill, Tomb Raider, and many more.

The valley awaits. can you crack The Code?
